release.change: Tweak: Cleaned up some code.
Bugfix: Fixed problem caused by missing store flyers.
Feature: Added crawling of all store location flyers for Toronto.
Feature: Improved DB population time.
Bugfix: Fixing layout problems with Android versions less than 4.2.2.
Tweak: Added visual feedback for clicking on categories.
Feature: Improved layout for adding custom items to the cart.
Feature: Implemented shopping cart as a wrapper of the basic grocery list. Code reuse ftw.
Feature: Added basic client-side localization. The app will give warnings when started outside of our supported area (Toronto for now).
Feature: Offloaded static calculations to the splash screen. This seems to dramatically improve the responsiveness of the app once it is loaded.
Bugfix: Fixing grocery list updating sync.
Bugfix: Fixing notification behaviour (again).
Bugfix: Fixing Gingerbread support.
Tweak: Various code improvements.
Feature: Items can now be added to the cart manually by voice.
Feature: Items can now be added to the cart manually by barcode.
Feature: Improved About dialog box.
Tweak: Reworked how changelogs are displayed.
Feature: Added skeleton for adding custom items to the cart with voice and barcodes.
Feature: Code improvements that should slightly improve performance.
Feature: Various performance improvements.
Feature: Re-added on-the-fly searching.
Bugfix: Fixed problems arising from distance display.
Tweak: Played around with the grocery list layout a bit.
Feature: Added actions for the expandable grocery list drawer.
Feature: Added first draft of distance display. Note that this is still in the experimental stage, and will contribute to most of the lag that is experienced in the grocery list view.
Bugfix: [Finally] fixed persistence of cart status when list views are recycled.
Tweak: Added navigation drawer headings.
Tweak: Reworked grocery list layout.
TODO: Needs more icons.
Feature: Added a changelog dialog!
Feature: Added an expandable drawer in the grocery list view (for now the buttons don't do anything).
Feature: Refactored grocery list view to allow for integration to shopping cart.
Bugfix: Fixed server bug (kudos to Bill for the hard work).
Tweak: Played around with the category grid sizes.
